sentences.en: After the meal they felt rusty , and stiff - jointed , and a little homesick once more.
sentences.cn: 吃完之后他们都觉得不痛快,骨节也发僵, 而且又有点想家了.

sentences.en: Are these bars opened to serve homesick Irish expats living abroad?
sentences.cn: 这些酒吧是用来招待那些移居海外思乡心切的爱尔兰人 吗 ?

sentences.en: But Mr Ecevit wrote that in London, homesick, in 1947.
sentences.cn: 埃杰维特,写于伦敦,一九四七年, 思乡.

sentences.en: He was so homesick that he could hardly endure the misery of it.
sentences.cn: 他非常想家,简直有些受不了这种苦恼.

sentences.en: I reckon he's pretty homesick to tell the truth.
sentences.cn: 我估计他说了实话,他太想家了.

sentences.en: It makes me homesick to look at it.
Mr. Parker : Not too bad . I feel a little homesick sometimes, though.
sentences.cn: 我可以想象得到身在外国的感觉.帕克先生,您可以经常去打保龄球. 很有趣的.

sentences.en: Now I know where to go when I feel homesick.
sentences.cn: 现在我知道想家的时候该去哪儿了.

sentences.en: They began to feel homesick and headed back down south.
sentences.cn: 他们开始想家,返回南部.

trans.tran_cn: 想家的，患思乡病的，莼鲈之思
trans.tran_en: feeling unhappy because you are a long way from your home
